pr_title: CB-7365 Extract magic string literals in AwsInstanceView

timeline.bodyText: As it is used in case of GCP we could move this constant one layer upper to the provider generic InstanceTemplate class.
timeline.author: biharitomi
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,90 @@ +package com.sequenceiq.cloudbreak.cloud.model.instance; + +import java.util.Collection; +import java.util.Map; + +import com.sequenceiq.cloudbreak.cloud.model.InstanceStatus; +import com.sequenceiq.cloudbreak.cloud.model.InstanceTemplate; +import com.sequenceiq.cloudbreak.cloud.model.Volume; +import com.sequenceiq.common.api.type.EncryptionType; + +public class AwsInstanceTemplate extends InstanceTemplate { + + /** + * Key of the optional dynamic parameter denoting whether EBS encryption is enabled or not. This applies to both root & attached (data) volumes. + * + *

+ * Permitted values: + *

    + *
  • {@code Boolean.TRUE} instance, {@code "true"} (ignoring case): Encryption is enabled.
    • + *
  • {@code Boolean.FALSE} instance, {@code "false"} (or any other {@code String} not equal to {@code "true"} ignoring case), {@code null}: + * Encryption is disabled.
    • + *
+ *

+ * + * @see #putParameter(String, Object) + * @see Boolean#parseBoolean(String) + */ + public static final String EBS_ENCRYPTION_ENABLED = "encrypted"; + + /** + * Key of the optional dynamic parameter denoting the type of AWS KMS encryption key to use for EBS encryption. Relevant only when encryption has been + * enabled via parameter {@link #EBS_ENCRYPTION_ENABLED}. + * + *

+ * Permitted values are the names of enum constants in {@link EncryptionType}: + *

    + *
  • {@code "NONE"}, {@code null}: No KMS key. Since EBS encryption always needs some KMS key, this setting essentially disables encryption.
    • + *
  • {@code "DEFAULT"}: Use the default + * key for EBS encryption in the target Region. This can actually point to the AWS-managed KMS key with alias {@code alias/aws/ebs}, or + * some customer-managed symmetric KMS key.
    • + *
  • {@code "CUSTOM"}: Use the customer-managed symmetric KMS key specified in {@link #EBS_ENCRYPTION_KMS_KEY_ARN}.
    • + *
+ *

+ * + * @see #EBS_ENCRYPTION_ENABLED + * @see #EBS_ENCRYPTION_KMS_KEY_ARN + * @see #putParameter(String, Object) + * @see EncryptionType + */ + public static final String EBS_ENCRYPTION_KMS_KEY_TYPE = "type";

replies.bodyText: Done. Also moved the similarly common "key" constant.
replies.author: lajosrodek

timeline.message:
CB-7365 Extract magic string literals in AwsInstanceView

Also replace raw strings with EncryptionType enum constant names.

Squashed commits:

CB-7365 Move EBS_ENCRYPTION_KMS_KEY_TYPE and EBS_ENCRYPTION_KMS_KEY_ARN
        to superclass InstanceTemplate, renaming them to
        VOLUME_ENCRYPTION_KEY_TYPE and VOLUME_ENCRYPTION_KEY_ID,
        respectively. Replace occurrences of these magic strings in GCP
        classes & tests as well.

CB-7365 Extract magic string literals in AwsInstanceView

Also replace raw strings with EncryptionType enum constant names.

Squashed commits:

CB-7365 Move EBS_ENCRYPTION_KMS_KEY_TYPE and EBS_ENCRYPTION_KMS_KEY_ARN
        to superclass InstanceTemplate, renaming them to
        VOLUME_ENCRYPTION_KEY_TYPE and VOLUME_ENCRYPTION_KEY_ID,
        respectively. Replace occurrences of these magic strings in GCP
        classes & tests as well.

Also replace raw strings with EncryptionType enum constant names.

        to superclass InstanceTemplate, renaming them to
        VOLUME_ENCRYPTION_KEY_TYPE and VOLUME_ENCRYPTION_KEY_ID,
        respectively. Replace occurrences of these magic strings in GCP
        classes & tests as well.
